text:
"We are clearly not ready to open."

Nevada Gov. Steve Sisolak responds to Las Vegas Mayor Carolyn Goodman's call for the city's businesses to reopen amid the coronavirus pandemic. "I will not allow the citizens of Nevada, our Nevadans to be used as a control group." https://t.co/F100tYgEF8
